item.title: NVIDIA GPU and CUDA Setup Guide
item.description: Verifying NVIDIA Hardware and CUDA Installation # Check NVIDIA GPU # First, let’s verify if your system recognizes the NVIDIA GPU: Open a terminal and run: lspci | grep -i nvidia This should display information about your NVIDIA GPU. Right-click on the Windows Start button and select “Device Manager” Expand the “Display adapters” section You should see your NVIDIA GPU listed here Recent Macs don’t use NVIDIA GPUs.
